description:
Truck Simulator City Delivery invites you to immerse yourself in a lifelike driving experience as you navigate through stunning cities. This simulator boasts an array of diesel truck brands, each featuring authentic engine sounds and intricately designed interiors. For a modern twist, you can also take the wheel of Electric Trucks!

Embark on journeys across the world's most renowned cities, ensuring timely package deliveries. Rise through the ranks to become a professional truck driver and revel in the challenges of career mode.

Features:
• Diesel Trucks
• Electric Trucks
• Many cities from around the world: Berlin, San Francisco, Dubai, Shangai, Madrid, Buenos Aires
• Different weather conditions
• Realistic Physics
• Manual and Automatic Transmission
• Realistic Engine Sounds (V8, Cummins, etc..)
• Career Mode
• Intelligent Traffic System
name: Truck Simulator City Delivery
